Row.Text: This will reset ALL options to their default values.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_RED]Some changes may not take effect until you restart the application.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reset options?
Some changes may not take effect until you restart the application.
Some changes may not take effect until you restart the current game.
Do you want to keep the current resolution settings?
New to Civilization VI - Gathering Storm
New to Civilization VI - Rise and Fall
Tells the game which graphics card to use.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_RED]Requires application restart![ENDCOLOR]
Only available on DX12 multi-GPU setups.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_RED]Requires application restart![ENDCOLOR]
Sets the resolution the game renders at.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Lower values [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increase performance[ENDCOLOR].
Increases the size of the user interface.[NEWLINE](Only available at certain resolutions.)
Modifies how the game's window is displayed.
Changes advanced settings to match the desired performance impact.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Lower values decrease visual fidelity, but [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increase performance[ENDCOLOR].
Changes advanced settings to match the desired memory impact.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Lower values decrease visual fidelity, but [COLOR_Blue]decrease memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
Limits the rate at which the game renders.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Might increase battery life on portable devices when enabled.
Smooths out jagged edges.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Lower values [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increase performance[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_Blue]decrease memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
Uses high-detail textures for game assets.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Blue]decreases memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
Darkens areas of objects that are less exposed to ambient light.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR].
Changes the ambient occlusion detail.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Lower values [COLOR_Blue]decrease memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
Changes the ambient occlusion quality.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Lower values [COLOR_Blue]decrease memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
Adds glow to bright lights and reflections.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR].
Adds light sources other than the sun.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR].
Add dark areas where light is blocked by an object.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR].
Changes the sharpness and detail of shadows.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Lower values [COLOR_Blue]decrease memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
Add dark areas where light is blocked by clouds.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR].
Draws the overlays on top of everything, not just on top of the terrain.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR].
Changes the terrain detail.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Lower values [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increase performance[ENDCOLOR] and/or [COLOR_Blue]decrease memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
Terrain geometry becomes sharper and more detailed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR].
Terrain textures become sharper and more detailed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Blue]decreases memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
Changes the terrain lighting.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_Blue]decreases memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
Increases the amount of trees and ice chunks.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR].
Water waves and highlights become sharper and more detailed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Blue]decreases memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
Control the quality of water reflections.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR].
Add reflections to terrain and water.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR].
Control the quality of reflections.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Using fewer passes or disabling will [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increase performance[ENDCOLOR].
Changes the audiovisual quality of leaders.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Disabling [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]increases performance[ENDCOLOR] and lower values [COLOR_Blue]decrease memory usage[ENDCOLOR].
This option replaces the Hold-to-Drag behavior of draggable UI elements with simple clicks to pick up and drop them.
Play By Cloud End Turn Behavior:
Play By Cloud Client Ready Behavior:
Allows Civilization VI to control lighting on computers and peripherals that are compatible with Logitech Gaming Software or Alienware AlienFX.
Toggles visibility of the World Climate Screen
Toggles visibility of the Governors Screen
Toggles visibility of the Historic Timeline Screen
Toggles visibility of the Era Progress Panel
Toggles visibility of the Tech Tree
Toggles visibility of the Civics Tree
Toggles visibility of the Government Screen
Toggles visibility of the Religion Screen
Toggles visibility of the Great People Screen
Toggles visibility of the Great Works Screen
Toggles visibility of the Rankings Screen
Toggles visibility of the City-States Screen
Toggles visibility of the Espionage Screen
Toggles visibility of the Trade Routes Screen
Goes back in the page history when the Civilopedia is open
Goes forward in the page history when the Civilopedia is open
Toggles visibility of the Full Screen Map
Performs the Found City action if the selected unit is a Settler.
Performs the Move To action with the selected unit.
Fortifies the selected unit until it is fully healed.
Performs the Attack action with the selected unit.
Performs the Ranged Attack action with the selected unit.
Enables auto-explore on the selected unit.
The selected unit skips the current turn.
Performs the Sleep action with the selected unit.
Performs the Alert action with the selected unit.
Ends the player's turn if possible.
Toggles a grid overlay over the terrain.
Loads the most recent quick save, if one exists.
Switches to the next ready unit.
Switches to the previous ready unit.
Toggles the visibility of the yield icons.
Pans the view of the map up
Pans the view of the map down
Pans the view of the map left
Pans the view of the map right
Toggles the visibility of the resource icons.
Toggles the game between standard and strategic (2D) views.
Emulates cursor movement using analog sticks.
Switch focus to the next option to the right.
Switch focus to the previous option to the left.
Selects the current option or highlighted plot.
Closes the current menu or deselect the current selection.
Selects the next turn blocking action that needs to be taken.
Enable/disable tooltips in the selected menu.
Controls plot selection on the map.
Pan the camera when the map is selected.
Select the plot currently in the center of the camera.
Select the menu item above the current selection.
Select the menu item below the current selection.
Select the menu item to the left of the current selection.
Select the menu item to the right of the current selection.
